System Requirements:

Game information:

"Vivisector: Beast Within" - is a powerful blend of chilling
horror and hurricane 3D-action ', subordinate to the rigid
laws of the rapidly evolving plot. The game world is an isolated
island in the ocean, divided into a plurality of interconnected
levels. Your path will pass through tropical jungles, dense
forests and snow-capped mountains. Forced his way through the
enormous experimental units, you will feel in their own skin,
which can make the human genius, directed in a false direction.
You come up with a miracle surviving soldiers, who were thrown
to his death here. Surrounded by artificial beast-men, they
indiscriminately fired in the direction of any rustle or movement.
Only among them you will feel what it means to be a real man among
these wild creatures - failed similarities of people.

Game Features:

Speedy destruction. Killing a certain number of monsters
in the shortest period of time. Experience is awarded for
each enemy killed.
Multiubiystvo. Simultaneous destruction of a certain number
of monsters. Points are awarded for each of the killed enemies.
This is easiest to do with weapons, inflicting damage on a certain radius.
Fatalities. Application fatal injuries after the death of
the enemy. For each round, caught in a vulnerable place of
the enemy after his murder, the player gains experience.
Vivisection. Dismembered corpse monster using bladed weapons.
Curiosity. Progress towards a roundabout, not direct ways.
One of the most readily available bonuses. Given when the
map of interesting places, buildings and other objects.
Finding hidden locations. Seldom, but they player can find
really useful things, and get plenty of experience.
Accuracy. If the accuracy of hitting the enemies will be
50% or higher, the player will receive experience points
in an amount directly proportional to the percentage of hits.
Resistance. Killing multiple enemies without getting damaged.
Artistry. Execution of tricks particularly complex or unusual
way. If a player manages to somehow unusual way to overcome
an obstacle or get ammunition, weapons, hear the thunder of
applause, shouts of "Bravo" and will appear: theatrical masks.
Depending on the complexity of the
action performed are assigned points.

Repack Features:

Vivisector: Beast Within
Version of the game - v1.1
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
